config.configDesc: (Moraš da pritisneš 'Sačuvaj i pokreni ponovo' da bi neke promene stupile na snagu)
config.extremeGamesDesc: Dozvolite prikazivanje oznaka unutar grupa filtera za oznake „Ekstreme“ i odgovarajućih igara.
config.enableEditingDesc: Omogućava uređivanje igara i dodatnih aplikacija. Takođe prikazuje kartice vezane za uređivanje.
config.onDemandImagesDesc: Preuzmi i sačuvaj nedostajuće logotipe i slike ekrana čim su potrebni.
config.currentLanguageDesc: Koji jezik će aplikacija da koristi probitno.
config.fallbackLanguageDesc: Koji jezik da se koristi umesto nepotpunog trenutnog jezika.
config.flashpointPathDesc: Putanja do Flashpoint fascikle (može da bude relativna)
config.randomLibrariesDesc: Biblioteke koje se koriste za nasumični izbor na početnoj strani.
config.nativePlatformsDesc: Koristi domaće verzije ovih platformi. (Ako nisu dostupne koristiće Wine)
config.tagFilterGroupsDesc: Ove grupe će filtrirati predloge i igre van rezultata pretrage
config.appPathOverridesDesc: Pregazi putanju aplikacije levo sa onom desno tokom pokretanja igara.
config.useCustomTitleBarDesc: Koristi traku sa prilagođenim nazivom na vrhu ovog prozora.
config.logoSetDesc: ID logo-a je stavljen u upotrebu.
config.showDeveloperTabDesc: Prikaži karticu 'Programer'. Ovo je najverovatnije jedino korisno za programere i kustose.
config.serverDesc: Koje server proces da pokrenem tokom pokretanja.
config.metadataServerHostDesc: Host servera za metapodatak. Koristi se za sinhronizaciju nove i ispravljene informacije o igri sa pokretačem.
config.noExtensionsLoaded: Dodaci nisu učitani, instaliraj ih u '{0}'

home.hallOfFameInfo: Hoćeš samo najbolje od najboljeg? Pogledaj {0}!
home.allGamesInfo: Tražiš li da igraš nešto? Prikaži {0}.
home.allAnimationsInfo: Hoćeš li samo da pogledaš nešto? Prikaži {0}.
home.configInfo: Hoćeš li da promeniš nešto? Idi na {0}.
home.notes: Ne zaboravi da pročitaš priručnik ako imaš problema.

developer.developerDesc: Ovde će se nalaziti svi važni programerski alati.
developer.checkMissingImagesDesc: Listaj sve igre bez sličica ili snimka ekrana
developer.checkGameIdsDesc: Listaj sve igre sa dupliranim ili nevažećim ID
developer.checkGameTitlesDesc: Listaj sve igre sa dupliranim nazivima na istoj platformi
developer.checkGameFieldsDesc: Listaj sve igre sa praznim stavkama (od stavki koje ne treba da budu prazne)
developer.checkPlaylistsDesc: Listaj sve plejliste sa dupliranim ili nevažećim ID, ili koje imaju unose sa nedostajućim, nevažećim ili dupliranim ID
developer.checkGameFileLocationDesc: Listaj sve igre sa pokretačkim komandama koje ne mogu da se rasčlane u putanje fajla (ovo je povezano sa funkcijom 'Otvori lokaciju fajla', ne sa pokretanjem igre)
developer.checkMissingExecMappingsDesc: Listaj sva jedinstvena izvršavanja za win32, linux i darwin kojima nedostaje preslikavanje izvršavanja
developer.renameImagesTitleToIdDesc: Nađi sve slike igara sa naslovom u imenu njihovog fajla i preimenuj ih da koriste njihov ID
developer.renameImagesIdToTitleDesc: Nađi sve slike igara sa ID igara u naslovu njihovog fajla i preimenuj ih da koriste njihov naslov
developer.createMissingFoldersDesc: Нађи све недостајуће фасцикле у Flashpoint структури фасцикли и створи их
developer.importLegacyPlatformsDesc: Uvozi nasleđene platforme iz `Data/Platforms/` - UPOZORENjE: Ovo će da pregazi neusklađene igre
developer.fixPrimaryAliasesDesc: Dodaje primarni nadimak bilo kom tagu kojima to nedostaje
developer.fixCommaTagsDesc: Razdvaja tagove sa zarezima na više tagova i primenjuje ih na svim primenljivim igrama
developer.exportTagsDesc: Creates a file full of tags and tag categories that can be used by 'Import Tags'
developer.importTagsDesc: Imports Tags from an file created by 'Export Tags'
developer.migrateExtremeGamesDesc: Removes 'Extreme' from any games and assigns the 'LEGACY-Extreme' tag to them
developer.massImportGameDataDesc: Mass imports Game Data packs, attempting to match their filename to a games UUID.

about.flashpointDesc: The preservation project this launcher was built for, that aims to be an archive, museum and playable collection of web-based Internet games.
about.flashpointLauncherDesc: An open-source desktop application used to browse, manage and play games from the Flashpoint project.
about.licenseInfo: MIT (Read the file named 'LICENSE' for more information)

browse.dropImageHere: Drop an image here to add it
browse.clickToSelectGame: Click on a game to select it.
browse.dropGameOnLeft: Drop a game on this playlist in the {0} to add it.
browse.setFlashpointPathQuestion: Have you set the path to the {0} at the {1} page?
browse.noteSaveAndRestart: Note: You have to press {0} for the change to take effect.
browse.noGameMatchedDesc: No game title matched your search.
browse.noGameMatchedSearch: Try searching for something less restrictive.

tags.name: Name
tags.makeAliasWhenMerged: Make this an alias of the tag?

curate.importAllDesc: Import all curations that are currently loaded
curate.deleteAllDesc: Delete all curations that are currently loaded
curate.symlinkCurationContent: Symlink Curation Content Folder (Admin prompts on Windows, Required for MAD4FP)
curate.openCurationsFolderDesc: Open the Curations folder in explorer
curate.openExportsFolderDesc: Open the default Exports folder containing your exported curations.
curate.openImportedFolderDesc: Open the default Imported curations folder containing your imported curations.
curate.newCurationDesc: Creates a new curation with a unique folder
curate.loadMetaDesc: Load one or more Curation meta files
curate.loadArchiveDesc: Load one or more Curation archives
curate.loadFolderDesc: Load one or more Curation folders
curate.scanNewCurationFoldersDesc: Scans for curations that have been added after the initial scan
curate.heading: Heading
curate.deleteCurationDesc: Delete this curation (Files can not be recovered)
curate.noLaunchCommand: 'Launch Command' is a required field. Please fill it in before importing.
curate.invalidLaunchCommand: 'Launch Command' does not fit these URL requirements:
curate.releaseDateInvalid: 'Release Date' must follow YYYY-MM-DD (month and day are optional).
curate.unusedApplicationPath: 'Application Path' has an unused value. Make sure it's spelled correctly!
curate.unusedTags: The following tags are not present on any other game. Are they correct?
curate.unusedPlatform: 'Platform' has an unused value. Make sure it's spelled correctly!
curate.nonExistingLibrary: 'Library' is not the name of an existing library! (Default will be used)
curate.nonContentFolders: Non-Content folders found in Curation folder. Are they supposed to be there?
curate.noTags: There are no tags on this curation.
curate.unenteredTag: The Tags text field hasn't been submitted.
curate.noLogo: There is no logo on this curation.
curate.noScreenshot: There is no screenshot on this curation.
curate.ilc_nonExistant: Point to an existing file in your curation's 'content' folder.

playlist.saveDesc: Save changes made and stop editing
playlist.discardDesc: Discard changes made and stop editing

misc.deleteAllBlankImages: Delete ALL {0} images for this game

dialog.phpNotFound:
PHP was not found on the path. Is it installed?
You may encounter unexpected and broken behaviour without it.
dialog.wineNotFound:
Wine is not installed, but is required to run this game.
Please see the Linux Support wiki article for details.
dialog.flashpointPathNotFound: The Flashpoint folder is not set or is invalid. Do you want to choose a folder to install to now?
dialog.importedPlaylistAlreadyExists: Imported playlist already exists with same name! - '{0}'
dialog.selectFileToExportMeta: Select file to save meta to
dialog.selectFolderToExportMetaAndImages: Select folder to save meta and images to
dialog.exportedAlreadyExistsYesNo:
One or more of the exported files already exists.
 Do you want to replace them?
dialog.selectFileToExportPlaylist: Select file to save the Playlist to
dialog.dataRequiredDesc:
You must install the Upgrade on the home screen before being able to use the launcher.

Do you wish to do this now?
dialog.verifyPathSelection: Future upgrades will also install here. Is this correct?
dialog.restartToApplyUpgrade:
This upgrade will not be applied until you restart.
Do you wish to do this now?
dialog.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
dialog.areYouSurePlaylistRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this entry from the playlist?
dialog.uploadPrivacyWarning:
This will make your Logs available publicly.
A link will be copied to your clipboard.

Are you sure?
dialog.overwriteFileMessage: A file with the same name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
dialog.removePlaylistGame: Remove this Game from the Playlist?
dialog.deleteGame: Delete this Game? This cannot be undone.
dialog.deleteGameData: Delete this Game Data? This cannot be undone.
dialog.unableToUninstallGameData: Unable to delete data pack. Is it in use? Try restarting the launcher.
dialog.unableToDeleteGame: Unable to delete game. Is it in use? Try restarting the launcher.
dialog.aFewMinutes: This may take a few minutes.

upgrades.infinityDesc: Required files. Adds support for Flash games.
upgrades.techDesc: Adds support for all other tech - Shockwave, Unity, Java, HTML5, etc.
upgrades.screenshotsDesc: Adds logos for Grid view and screenshots for all games.
